venue.address_1: Bay State Rd. and Sherborn St.
venue.name: Soldiers Field Playground

item.description:
Hello dearest runners!

COME ONE COME ALL to the NIFTY-est 5k and Food Fundraiser of 2009!!!

Some of you cool cats may already know, but this coming Spring I am embarking on an adventure of a lifetime. I will be running across America, from Boston to San Diego! This has been a dream of mine for the last 10 years of my life, and now, it's time to put my feet to the road. WHY?!?! I am 100% passionate about empowering people to follow their passions and dreams. Look inside yourself and embrace what you love and pursue it! Using this run as a metaphor, I will be spreading this message across the country, and FUNDRAISING for a charity that empowers girls through running - Girls on the Run. You can learn more about my run and donate on my website www.paveyourlane.com. (My website is still a work in progress.)

This 9-month TransAmerica run will also cost a bit of dough...and I could really really really use your help...

So, this 5K and Food Fundraiser goes like this. Meet at the playground at 2pm and we will run to Veggie Planet for an ALL YOU CAN EAT PIZZA, ETC. BUFFET! Veggie Planet has amazingly donated all this food for up to 50 people, and I will collecting donations (suggested $20) at the door to go towards my run's costs and the charity.

If you cannot make it to the 5K but want to come to Veggie Planet to EAT, meet us at 2:45pm at Veggie Planet. You must RSVP if you will come to eat because it is limited to the first 50 people! Email me at Katie.Visco@gmail.com to RSVP for food.

Any questions?! Email or call me at 630.660.4597. I really hope you all can make it! It would mean the world to me.

Love,
Katie

ps. Soldier Field Playground is the playground along the south side of the Charles River Path, about .3 miles WEST of the Mass Ave. Bridge. Pretty convenient.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for playground and big group -on Charles path just west of Mass Ave Bridge.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Run Across America 5K and Food Fundraiser!
